com.flexisaf.ses.services

Class StudentEnrolmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flexisaf.ses.services.StudentEnrolmentService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Path(value="StudentEnrolmentService")
public class StudentEnrolmentService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides an endpoint interface to perform CRUD operations on the Student entity.
    See Also:

      javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteStudentRecord(java.lang.String recordJson, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service deletes the student specified by recordJson..
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByCreatorID(java.lang.String creatorUserID, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students created by the same user whose user ID is creatorUserID.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByDepartmentID(java.lang.String departmentID, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students of the same department specified by ID departmentID.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByFirstName(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students whose first names match the firstName field.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByFullName(java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String otherName, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students whose full names match the specified full (ie firstName, lastName, and otherName).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByGenderType(java.lang.String genderType, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students whose gender matches genderType.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByLastName(java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students whose last names match the lastName field.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentListByOtherName(java.lang.String otherName, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students whose other name field match the otherName field.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response findStudentsByCreateDateInterval(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service retrieves all students created between the date range between startDate and endDate.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response saveStudent(java.lang.String recordJson, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service creates a student.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendHappyBirthEmailToAllCelebrants(java.lang.String emailGatewayConfigJson, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String messageText, java.lang.String userAcctJson)
      This service looks up all students whose birth days fall on the current date and dispatches a happy birth day message to each of them.
